LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Bulgasal.label: Bulgasal
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Bulgasal.description: A heavy multi-purpose tank suitable for combat. Depending on the situation it can switch between an armor piercing anti-tank gun or an anti-infantry gun.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalSiege.label: Bulgasal (siege type)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalSiege.description: A heavy multi-purpose tank equiped with a large plasma gun suitible for sieging.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalGrenade.label: Bulgasal (grenade type)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalGrenade.description: A heavy multi-purpose tank equiped with an anti-infantry grenade launcher. Not suited to take out heavily armored targets.
